string.name: school_law
string.br: 1.Never bring a toy or real gun, or weapon to school. This includes sharp and dangerous items.\n
2.Never beat or engage in physical conflict with another student.\n
3.Never, in words or actions, disrespect teacher or any member of the school staff.\n
5.Never leave the campus without a gate pass from the office.\n
6.Never play in the water or toilet area. Do not waste water.\n
7.Never go out to the classroom except break times or without a teacher permission.\n
8.Never bring electronics or mobile phones to school. Electronics found at school will be confiscated by the administration. Electronics will not be returned.\n
10.Never touch or disturb the property of others.\n
11.Never throw sharp objects the property of others.\n
12.Never disrespect another person culture or religion.\n
13.Never give gifts or money to any teacher staff member for any reason.\n
14.Never write on tables, walls or other school property.\n
16.Never bring gum or candy to school or use gum or candy to school.\n
17.Never play on the stairs or areas that are not play areas.\n
18.Never be absent from school without good cause. A medical certificate must be produced. In case of illness.\n
20.Always wear your uniform with shirt fucked in, stocks and closed sport shoes.\n
21.Always keep your hair and body well groomed.\n
22.Always raise your hand to speak in class.\n
23.Always write date and instructions before write anything else.\n
24.Always complete your class work and home word on time.\n
25.Always put your trash in the waste basket.\n
26.Always do you best in all things!!!\n

string.name: pasca_info
string.br: The Word Pasca Stands From Parent And School Communication Application. \n
Pasca is an android application.For the use of parent and teacher communicate easily for this app.This app is not only use communication purpose there are many advantage such as \n
1.One Pasca Application Uses Many Students By Changing Login Information.\n
2.These App Contains Iq Test Future. Amin Post Question And You Will Answer That Question.\n
3.The Best Of This App Future Is You Will Get Many Information About Your School. Such as Information About School Law, School Calendar, Fees Bank Information and e.t.c .. .\n
4.Another Advantage Of This App You Will See Your Teacher Profile One By One .\n
5.And You Will Complain Your Teacher or Director By Individual.\n
This Is Not Only Done. There are So Much.\n
WHO IS THE DESIGNER OF PASCA? \n\n
